blogPost.excerpt: Snaptrude is a next-gen 3D design tool for the construction industry. It helps Architects design efficient & sustainable buildings 10x faster on the web. It saves weeks’ worth of efforts as compared to legacy tools owing to its automation & data powered core.
blogPost.body: Snaptrude is a next-gen 3D design tool for the construction industry. It helps Architects design efficient & sustainable buildings 10x faster on the web. It saves weeks’ worth of efforts as compared to legacy tools owing to its automation & data powered core.
blogPost.title: Snaptrude - Design efficient buildings in 3D, 10x faster from the web
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Snaptrude是建筑行业的下一代3D设计工具。它可以帮助建筑师在网络上以10倍的速度设计高效和可持续的建筑。由于其自动化和数据驱动的核心，与传统工具相比，它可以节省数周的努力。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式设计高效建筑，从网络上看，速度快10倍

localize.description: Snaptrude是建築行業的下一代3D設計工具。它可以幫助建築師在網絡上以10倍的速度設計高效和可持續的建築。由於其自動化和數據驅動的核心，與傳統工具相比，它可以節省數週的努力。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式設計高效建築，從網絡上看，速度快10倍

previous.excerpt: Leadsie helps marketing freelancers & agencies get access to their clients’ Facebook assets & Google Analytics without hassle. ✅ Impress your clients with how fast you can start delivering them value. And stop wasting time getting access. 💪
previous.title: Leadsie Connect - 2-click access to Facebook & Google Analytics ✅

localize.description: Leadsie帮助营销自由职业者和代理公司无忧无虑地访问客户的Facebook资产和谷歌分析。✅ 让您的客户印象深刻，您可以如此快速地开始为他们提供价值。而不再浪费时间去获取。💪
Leadsie幫助營銷自由職業者和代理公司無憂無慮地訪問客戶的Facebook資產和谷歌分析。✅ 讓您的客戶印象深刻，您可以如此快速地開始爲他們提供價值。而不再浪費時間去獲取。💪

next.excerpt: GRID is a productivity tool that transforms spreadsheets into interactive, visually dynamic web documents. GRID makes sharing and presenting spreadsheet data and models smart, quick, and exceptionally valuable.
next.title: GRID - Turn your spreadsheets into smart, interactive web documents

localize.description: GRID是一个生产力工具，它可以将电子表格转化为交互式的、视觉上动态的网络文档。GRID使共享和展示电子表格数据和模型变得智能、快速和异常有价值。
localize.tagline: 将您的电子表格变成智能的交互式网络文档

localize.description: GRID是一個生產力工具，它可以將電子表格轉化爲交互式的、視覺上動態的網絡文檔。GRID使共享和展示電子表格數據和模型變得智能、快速和異常有價值。
localize.tagline: 將您的電子表格變成智能的交互式網絡文檔
